active_incidents.title: Signing in with Google or Apple may be failing for some customers

notes.body: We've resolved the issue, and all impacted customers should now be able to access Slack. You may need to reload Slack (Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + R) to see the fix on your end. We're so sorry again for  all the trouble this caused.

We’re investigating reports around failures with signing in with Google and Apple, where some customers may be seeing a glitch page. Magic link sign in works as expected.

We’re on the case and will provide another update once we have more details to share. We’re sorry for the inconvenience.
